titles.title: Truth in Domain Names Act of 2003
A bill to prevent the use of a misleading domain name with the intent to deceive a person into viewing obscenity on the Internet.
Truth in Domain Names Act of 2003

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Truth in Domain Names Act of 2003 - Amends the Federal criminal code to prohibit knowingly using a misleading domain name with the intent to deceive: (1) a person into viewing obscenity on the Internet; and (2) a minor into viewing material that is harmful to minors on the Internet.
